CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Applies extra constant rotational motion to the fractal.
CONTROLS.NAME: unfolding

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: X, Y, and Z params control the shape of the fractal.
CONTROLS.NAME: x_param

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: X, Y, and Z params control the shape of the fractal.
CONTROLS.NAME: y_param

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: X, Y, and Z params control the shape of the fractal.
CONTROLS.NAME: z_param

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: This controls the size of the blocks that form the fractal.
CONTROLS.NAME: size

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Move the X-axis to spin about your main axis, or move the Y-axis to tilt forwards or backwards.
CONTROLS.NAME: lookXY

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: ON: time variable is influenced by the audio bass. OFF: constant rate.
CONTROLS.NAME: reactive_time

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: How fast the time variable grows, whether it is reactive time or constant time.
CONTROLS.NAME: rate_in

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Blue, reflective lighting. Turn down to use more alternate lighting.
CONTROLS.NAME: standard_lighting

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Alternate lighting pattern, using built-in texture or user selected media. Scan it in and out with 'scan alt light'.
CONTROLS.NAME: alternate_lighting

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Moves the 'alternate lighting' source further from the camera.
CONTROLS.NAME: scan_alt_light

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: A rendering glitch that causes a strange liquifying effect near hard edges.
CONTROLS.NAME: liquify

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Brings in the far wall, resulting in very interesting patterns when brought up close.
CONTROLS.NAME: far_wall

DESCRIPTION: Constructing a basic fractal object with Knighty's Kaleidoscopic IFS procedure.
TITLE: KIFS Flythrough_dup
